title: Optical jig borers at work
creator_credit: Montana Film Zurich and Societe Genevoise D'Instruments de Physique
brief_description: A documentary on precision milling and boring machines. Opens by telling us the story of how a group of people created the “Societe Genevoise D’Instruments de Physique”, a society formed to create a way to measure using unit measurements. We then travel into the future to see how the dividing machines they originally created are working now.
